definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: beat out, fig. beat down, subdue (NH Pi. stamp or beat down, make flat, spread out; Targum [[רְדַד]] beat out; cf. prob. Ar. rad=a repel, reject (Nö:M 75); As. radâduis pursue (rare));—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: , fig., beat down: Inf. cstr. [[לְרַד לְפָנָיו גּוֹיִם]] Is 45:1; Pt. act. [[הָרוֹרֵד עַמִּי תַּחְתָָּי]] Ps 144:2;—so also Impf. [[יָרׂד]] Is 41:2 acc. Ew al. (for MT [[יַרְרְּ]], v. I. [[רדה]]

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: lit. beat out: Impf. 3 ms. [[אֶת־הַזָּזּהָב]]…[[וַיָּ֫רֶד עַל־הַכְּרוּבִים]]: 1Ki 6:32 and beat out the gold upon the cherubim (covered them with beaten gold).
